0.7.0.name: wordpress/dealnit-dealfeed-of-local-deals
0.7.0.description:
Earn money by streaming local deals from Groupon, LivingSocial, BuyWithMe, DealOn and more from an easy to install widget.

The Dealn.It DealFeed widget gives you access to deals from Groupon, LivingSocial, BuyWithMe, and many more. Visitors to your site will see local deals near them which increases relevancy and conversion.

The widget is customizable:

  • Categories
  • Display Title
  • Number of deals to display
  • Image size
  • Link target
  • Target deals to Lat/Lng
  • Dealn.It affiliate ID

We share 100% of the commissions with our affiliates. Sign up at http://dealn.it
